code: export async function sendCode(contact){let method=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'email';const res=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/verify/send"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({contact,method})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to send code');return res.json();}export async function verifyCode(contact,code){const res=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/verify/verify"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({contact,code})});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to verify code');return res.json();}
